type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.TargetedNativeComponent
type.description: * A native component that can be configured to target certain variant dimensions. * This functionality is a temporary workaround to eliminate configuration of unnecessary domain objects and tasks.

method.name: targetBuildTypes
method.description: * Specifies the names of one or more {@link BuildType}s that this component should be built for.

method.name: targetFlavors
method.description: * Specifies the names of one or more {@link Flavor}s that this component should be built for.
